attributes.action: give more help to army leavers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see more done for our army leavers, they have such a difficult time trying to fit back into civilian life, never mind the physical and emotional problems they have to live with day to day. They are fighting for our country and saved many lives all over they world, should we not help them as they have helped us. More training should be give and help with there emotional problems as that seems to a major issue. Please sign and help our soldiers when they leave.
